page.title: 06Population
page.content: Tiree High School has.49 secondary pupils and 50 primary pupils.There are approximately 750 people living on the island.Earlier in the century there was approximately 4000 people living on the island.Most emigrated to the mainland and some emigrated to Canada and Australia mostly to find better employment.On Tiree now most people are crofters or fishermen.On the island there are 7 shops and some vans go around the island selling food etc. There are 3 post offices and 2 butchers on the island.
